title: Demography of Australia
summary: The demography of Australia covers basic statistics, most populous cities, ethnicity and religion. The population of Australia is estimated to be 25,906,300 as of 29 November 2021.[1] Australia is the 55th[4] most populous country in the world and the most populous Oceanian country. Its population is concentrated mainly in urban areas and is expected to exceed 28 million by 2030.[5]
